features: Eye Protection and Toddler Education Toy: The LCD writing tablet adopts LCD pressure-sensitive technology and features a 12-inch LCD colorful screen. This innovative toddler doodle board provides eye protection and is safe and comfortable to use for long periods of time. It offers ample space for graffiti and easy viewing, stimulating a child's imagination and creativity, while providing an enhanced preschool learning experience. Perfect for 3 to 8-year-old boys and girls

Safer and Environmental Protection: This kids drawing pad is designed with safety in mind. We have added a screw on the back side of the battery to prevent accidental swallowing of small parts. The writing pad can provide approximately 100,000 writings, reducing paper and pencil waste and saving on expenses. No more mess at home!

Easy to Use: The writing tablet allows kids to create colorful lines with the stylus, just like writing and drawing on paper. Press the erase button to clear the screen in just one second, making it convenient and time-saving. Lock the content with the click lock key to save it, and easily erase the pattern after unlocking

Portable and Durable: The kid's drawing board is made of durable plastic and features a round corner design for better shock resistance and drop resistance. It is lightweight and easy to carry, making it suitable for various occasions such as travel, airplanes, cars, restaurants, and sofas. Easily fits in school bags, handbags, and travel bags

Great Gift for Kids: The LCD writing tablet serves multiple purposes and can be used as a doodle board, drawing pad, writing board, graphic aids, and more. It is the perfect choice as a gift for back-to-school, birthdays, Thanksgiving, Christmas, and any other occasion

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fun Learning Education Toys Gifts for Boys Girls Age 3 4 5 6 7 8+ Educational toys drawing pad, a greater helper for drawing, note taking, memo, reminding, massage, drafting, scribbler and etc, Ideal gift for children, free your kid’s creativity and Imagination with colorful pad!

Protect Eyesight This toddler doodle board adopts LCD pressure-sensitive technology and a 10-inch LCD colorful screen, without radiation, no blue light, no glare, safe and comfortable.It’s time to reduce the time it takes for kids to use their pads and phones, and protect your child's eyes. Lock key and Erase Button One-click clearing, it takes only one second to empty content on the screen, which is convenient for saving time.The lock key can freeze the content to avoid accidentally erasing the screen so that it ensures continuous writing or drawing, you can still erase the content after unlocking to ensure a good writing experience. Enjoy Entertainment Time No need to worry about the children getting bored, anytime, anywhere, tic-tac-toe game, enjoy the happy leisure time！
Be Friends with Nature One doodle pad can write more than 100,000 times, and can save 100,000 pieces of paper and 5 big trees, let's work together to protect the environment
It is the best gift for children on Children’s Day, Xmas, going to school, Birthday, Halloween, Travel, etc, great indoor-outdoor toy for kids aged 2+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Great writing pad! Write, draw, scribble, hit erase button, repeat. That easy. Very light but seem to be handling life with 8,6,and 2 quite well. Only wish the magnets on the back were a pinch stronger, wants to slide down the fridge. Easy fix though. Great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Toddler-tested and approved!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this digital drawing pad. It has been a great interactive toy for while we are at restaurants or doctor’s offices. He loves drawing on it himself and then asking us to draw! He’s 2.5 years old.I specifically chose this one because it had a way of tying the stylus to the tablet, and it has stood the test of a toddler’s whims. It’s actually a coiled strand of plastic (?) that is stretchy, and he has dragged the tablet via the attached stylus, all over the house. I thought he destroyed it a few times, but it has gone back to its original length and same stretchiness. I’m honestly impressed.The screen itself works great, and it’s nice that there is some color variation when you draw. You can also lock the screen by a small sliding button on the back so that it doesn’t accidentally erase your content—or so that you can confuse your toddler like my husband did.This particular one also has magnets on the back, so I kind of want to get another one to stick on the fridge. I could use it for grocery lists throughout the week, or I can put it down low for him to draw on. I could also get two more—one for each—because they are so inexpensive! About $10 a piece.The battery is also nice because I can change it out. We haven’t had to yet, but it is lest waste because I don’t have to get a whole new tablet when it dies.Overall, we love this and will probably be buying again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A great trip toy, simple to use, light & entertaining!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Endless Creativity, Mess-Free Fun - LCD Writing Tablet for Toddlers Review
reviews.reviewText: As a parent always on the lookout for engaging and mess-free activities for my toddler, the LCD Writing Tablet for Toddlers has proven to be a delightful addition to our playtime repertoire. This 10-inch colorful, erasable doodle board brings together entertainment and education in a seamless package. Here's why it's become a cherished item in our household.Vibrant and Colorful Display (5/5):The first thing that caught my eye was the vibrant and colorful display of the LCD Writing Tablet. The bright hues add an element of excitement, instantly capturing my toddler's attention. The attractive colors not only make doodling more enjoyable but also contribute to a visually stimulating play experience.Mess-Free Doodling (5/5):One of the standout features of this tablet is its mess-free doodling capability. No more worrying about crayon marks on the walls or accidental pen stains on clothes. The LCD screen allows my toddler to explore their creativity without the need for paper, crayons, or cleanup. It's a win-win for both parents and little artists.Easy to Use for Little Hands (5/5):The design of the tablet takes into consideration the dexterity of little hands. The stylus is easy to grip, allowing my toddler to navigate and draw effortlessly. The size of the tablet is just right for small hands, fostering independence as my child explores their artistic side.Educational Value (5/5):Beyond the entertainment factor, I appreciate the educational value of the LCD Writing Tablet. It serves as a canvas for early scribbling, drawing shapes, and even practicing letters and numbers. It's a versatile tool that grows with my toddler, adapting to their developmental milestones.Erasable and Reusable (5/5):The erasable feature of the tablet adds to its charm. A simple press of the button clears the screen, allowing my toddler to start anew with their creations. The reusable nature of the tablet not only minimizes waste but also ensures that the doodling possibilities are endless.Durable Build (5/5):The durability of the LCD Writing Tablet is noteworthy. It has withstood the occasional drops and bumps that come with toddler play. The sturdy construction gives me confidence in its longevity, making it a reliable investment in my child's playtime activities.Portable and On-the-Go Fun (5/5):The lightweight and portable design make the tablet perfect for on-the-go fun. Whether we're traveling, waiting at a doctor's office, or simply spending time outdoors, the LCD Writing Tablet is a convenient entertainment solution that keeps my toddler engaged without the need for bulky art supplies.Battery Efficiency (5/5):The tablet's battery efficiency is impressive. It has lasted through numerous doodling sessions without needing frequent replacements. This reliability ensures uninterrupted playtime for my toddler, and I appreciate not having to constantly worry about charging.Conclusion:In conclusion, the LCD Writing Tablet for Toddlers - 10 Inch Colorful Erasable Doodle Board is a gem for parents seeking a mess-free, educational, and entertaining solution for their little ones. With its vibrant display, mess-free doodling, easy usability for little hands, educational value, erasable and reusable features, durable build, portability, and battery efficiency, this tablet has seamlessly integrated into our daily play routine. Highly recommended for parents looking to foster creativity and learning in a fun and hassle-free way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Still not sure how it works lol, but its a cool device, draw whatever and erases instantly… Also it’s definitely very durable considering how thin it is. My 1 year old likes to throw things and it’s still in one piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome writing tablet!
reviews.reviewText: Kids LOVE this. It will entertain them for long periods of time. It’s a nice alternative to iPads and TV when you want your kids to take a break from all that screen time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I guess you get what you pay for. Money is tight at Christmas and I thought this was a great bargain. This was purchased for my grandson thinking it'd be great for him to write on without worrying about making a mess when he couldn't get out his paints. When I received it, it did not come with a cord to keep the stylus in place and it was very cheaply made. I contacted the seller and they indicated it did not come with the cord as it was pictured so I sent it back and bought another one that was bigger and a better quality. I had to pay more but I think paying more money was the better way to go.

reviews.reviewText: These were a big hit the kids. They are light weight and easy to use. Battery seems to last a while too
